options.content:
Other Flow Statistics
  • This dashboard provides a summary of flow information for science registry tagging, organizations, countries, protocols, ports, as well as volume and counts of flows.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test) AND meta.ip_version:4

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test) AND meta.ip_version:6

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg OR meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg ) AND NOT ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg AND meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg ) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

options.content: Flows with only one end tagged in Science Registry

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg AND meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg  ) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

options.content: Flows with both ends tagged in Science Registry

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
